name: CVOO Niskin Bottles
description: Hydrographic measuremenst at the Cape Verde Ocean Observatory (CVOO).

provider.legalName: Helmholtz Centre for Ocean Research Kiel

subevent.name: M68/2, M68/3
subevent.description: Hydrographic measurements from M68/2 and M68/3 taken at CVOO station

potentialAction.name: Determination of total dissolved inorganic carbon
result: total dissolved inorganic carbon concentrations per seawatar mass

potentialAction.name: Determination of total alkalinity
object: curve fitting method: modified Gran plot
result: total alkalinity concentrations per seawatar mass
